title: I almost hurt myself opening this... - VIZIO P-Series Quantum TV
description: Thanks to VIZIO for sponsoring this video! Purchase the P-Series Quantum 65" Class 4K HDR Smart TV here:   For all of VIZIOs Top Deals, click here:   This TV is not huge but it's still relatively big! This is a pretty decent choice if you have been eyeing something to use with your Xbox Series X and Sony PS5.  Dont forget to follow VIZIO for all of their latest giveaways and sweepstakes!
